short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Magic Drop enables any webpage image and your Google Drive files to be drag and dropped into any other website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually moving images from one page to another?

Magic Drop enables Drag & Drop for any image in your web browser. Simply drag it from one tab and drop it in an other. Say bye-bye to your downloads folder, and hello to a speedy workflow. âœ¨
